reviewText: This was a great deal!
Both of these are excellent.  And they are true stories.

We have watched both movies countless times, and still enjoy watching them. Both stories are heartwarming, inspiring, and entertaining. Acting Performances of the entire cast in Rudy were excellent, and in Radio were Outstanding. We collect inspirational movies, and this Double Feature is one of our old-time favorites. Inspiring, heartwarming, and entertaining. Highly recommended!
I realize this is just random bad luck, but the Radio disc came with a large crack in it and it was unreadable.
Just opened my DVD Double Feature in Hawaii to watch on vacation and BOTH DVD's were missing!!!!
Having 2 movies I love on 1 disc.....Love it....& they worked tooooooo
This will not play on my DVD in Sydney - waste of money.

I chose these two movies as a bundle because I wanted to motivate my two kids who are both already top athletes in their sports.  These movies are heart warming...family friendly movies about real life triumphs that two unlikely people would have.

Love the movies and my kids are still talking about no longer taking their talents for granted.
Both of these movies are two of my favorites. I can watch them over and over again. Service was fast and the products were in perfect condition. Thanks.

the depth of the stories makes it very entertaining to watch

This is an excellent movie. I showed it in my Junior high classroom as a treat the Friday before the Super Bowl. What started out as a football movie quickly became a discussion on tolerance, bullying, and respect. This movie is one of those timeless stories whose message is never outdated. The acting was excellent as well. Cuba Gooding Jr's performance was Oscar worthy in my opinion!
good price for 2 good movies
